What is Civil Hosting?


Civil hosting is a game server provider that's cheaper than everyone else.
We provide dedicated processors and DDR4 Memory.
Start your server here.


Our Promise

Civil Hosting tries to maintain consistant performance,
all for low costs than other competitors. If you can find another provider cheaper than us, we will price match.
